column6: Answer Scripts of the First Summative Assessment/ Semester Examination( Grades 6 to 11 ) are being sent home today. Kindly go through all of them thoroughly with your ward and affix your signature on the first sheet of each answer script. In case your ward's performance is not satisfactory you are requested to meet up with the corresponding subject teacher(s) at the earliest on the days mentioned in the diary. The duly signed answer scripts to be returned to the class teacher on Friday
